ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Error 1001
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah the LD monster nearly got me killed last night on the Saryrn Server when I was playing my newly leveled shaman in EW hunting the uthork. Couldn t have
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah the LD monster nearly got me killed last night on the Saryrn Server
when I was playing my newly leveled shaman in EW hunting the uthork.
Couldn't have come at a worse time I was OOM, LoHP (maybe had 5% hp), all
my buffs were gone (KEI included), pet was dead, and SoW was going. and I
had 3 Uthorks decide they wanted to break Enstill all at the same time . Oh
and I was soloing it. Seeing as this was my first time in EW and I was a
newly leveled 38 Shammy I was rather quite pleased with myself that I
managed to hold my own against 4 Uthorks by myself (well with help from my
faithful walking dot Xebaner) once and figured I could do it again. Well
that was when everything went wrong when the conditions I stated above
started to occur. I had almost killed one of the uthorks when the other 3
decided to break Enstill and I tried holding my own. Forgot I was OOM and
had no more KEI and tried to cast Enstill on the mobs (can we say panic?)
Finally I gave it up and ran when 2 of the uthorks decided that my pet
wasn't worth their time and joined their buddy in chasing me leaving my pet
to deal with an healthy Uthork. now turning to run probably was my worst
mistake when I saw those other 2 coming cause I got stunned and started to
spin. when I stopped spinning I began to run and realized I had no idea
where the heck I was Keep in mind I am new to the zone had come in earlier
with a guildy who took me directly to the Uthorks without giving me a tour
of the site and logged after we had killed 2 or 3 uthorks. SO I got lost
and was somewhere I have no Idea where in EW when I noticed that I was
getting no keyboard response. that's when looked at the connection
indicator and saw that it was a very broken yellow line that immediately
went to red and then I get the "You have been disconnected" message and I
knew I was a dead lvl 38 Shaman who would most likely be a Naked lvl 37
Barbarian Shaman standing near the Waterfall in GD when I logged back on.
When I logged back on I discovered I was on the bridge that goes to IC. And
I WAS ALIVE With Sow still Blinking at me, still OOM, and 20 hp left on me
AND STILL LEVEL 38

Cynfyn MacCulloch 51 DESK
Halyburton Bearhugger 38 BarbShm
Saltaque 12 HIEEnch
Qapmoc 11 HalfElf Ranger
Oroblram 9 Hu War
Doktari 7 HIE Cleric
Defender of the Faith
Saryrn Server
DoF Email list: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/DoFGuild/
Cynfyn's EverQuest: http://cyfyn.hypermart.net/eq/

----- Original Message -----
From: "Toni" <silly_girl4ever@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, October 12, 2002 1133
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Error 1001


>
> It seems people have been having trouble everywhere. My guild Hosted a
Kael raid last night & we had to call it when the LD monster kept rearing
it's ugly head. it seems from what others were saying is people were
dropping like flies all over the server last night. (going LD). hopefully
this problem will resolve itself =/.
> Katashaka Naboombu
> 51 Vah Shir Mystic
> Co-Leader of Claws of Night
> Vazaelle
>
